post:
Our enterprise founded in 2019, we set up a great infrastructure with strong and inovant hardware that we own.

Our goal is to offer the best quality service that fit all your needs, either professional or personal.

The 90% of our customers keep their business with us since our beginnings, The way that we run our business keeps our partnership with our customers endure for long term, we stay very close to out customers.


**What we Offer**

- Different locations datacenters : Dallas | Chicago | New Jersey| Los Angeles
- Basic DDoS Protection
- rDNS Service
- 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
- Paypal Payments method
- Windows License Server 2008 | 2012
- No contracts.
- SolusVM Control Panel | VMware hypervisor (VT-x/AMD-V)
- Enterprise-class hardware by Supermicro®
